description:
Library for the Christmas tree project.
Contains ws2811 Neopixel driver + tcs34725 color sensor.
name: christmas-tree

@/color-all.description: Colors all LEDs on the strip in the selected color

@/color-n-pixels.description: Colors a group of N LEDs in the selected color. Specify the start LED number of the group using the STRT pin. Specify the orderliness of a group at the STEP pin.

H1C6J5R1E.description: Number of LEDs to color after the start LED
H1C6J5R1E.label: N

rkCJUc0kN.description: Number of LEDs to color after the start LED
rkCJUc0kN.label: STEP

@/color-pixel.description: Colors particular LED on the strip in the selected color

@/tsc-color-sensor.description: Reads color from a tcs34725 color sensor

BJczBtR0X.description: Integration time value. Describes a number of cycles to integrate a color value. Possible values are 1, 10, 20, 42, 64, 256
BJczBtR0X.label: IT

BkO7rKCC7.description: Triggers initialization of the sensor and sets sensitivity
BkO7rKCC7.label: INIT

H1g5zHtC0X.description: An amplification factor of the color gain. Possible values are 1, 4, 16, 60
H1g5zHtC0X.label: GAIN

Hk7clUE_B.description: Updates the luminocity of the board  LED on incoming value change while `ACT` is true.
Hk7clUE_B.label: ACT

r1Dd99f1E.description: Board port number for the color-sensor breakout board LED
r1Dd99f1E.label: LED

@/ws2811.description: Controls WS2812 based LEDs and LED strings

Bkb1t3YARQ.description: LED brightness value in the range  [0,100]
Bkb1t3YARQ.label: B

ByJYnK00m.description: Board port number the ws2811 driver  is connected to
ByJYnK00m.label: DI

Ske1K2YRRQ.description: Number of LEDs on the string
Ske1K2YRRQ.label: SIZE

ryb8RY0yV.description: Number of pixels after the start pixel
ryb8RY0yV.label: N
